name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course guides non-English majors at the advanced level to develop their English conversation, reading, and critical thinking skills. Students will engage in presentations and discussions on a variety of issues from the main textbook, Real Reading 4, and other selected texts. They are also encouraged to critically examine these issues and relate them to their own lives.
